title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: “[Fracastoro] appears first used Latin word fomes, meaning tinder, sense infectious agent, essay contagion De Contagione et Contagiosis Morbis (Contagion Contagious Diseases), published 1546:[5]”call fomites [Latin fomes, meaning “tinder”] things clothes, linen, etc., although corrupt, can nevertheless foster essential seeds contagion thus cause infection.”[6] theory remained influential nearly three centuries, superseded fully developed germ theory. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Girolamo_Fracastoro
